headSection.personalDescription: My goal is to build engaging interfaces using modern technologies, while keeping the code clean, efficient, and scalable.

dondeSalgo.title: Dónde Salgo
dondeSalgo.description: Mobile application developed with React Native and Expo, focused on finding bars and other venues in Buenos Aires.

vanicracia.title: Vanicracia
vanicracia.description: E-commerce focused on astrology, built primarily with Next.js.

alfombrasTauro.title: Alfombras Tauro
alfombrasTauro.description: Website for a carpet business built with Next.js.

medicalSpace.title: Medical Space
medicalSpace.description: Web application to manage medical patients.

header.description: Hi! I'm Damián, currently a front-end developer. Over 2 years of experience.

frontend.title: Front-end
frontend.items: TypeScript, React, Next.js, React Native, Expo, Redux Toolkit

tools.title: Tools
tools.items: Motion, TanStack Query, React Toastify, React Hook Form, next-intl, i18next, Embla Carousel, Recharts

aboutMeSection.favoritesTools: Some of my favorite technologies and tools I've worked with.

vanicracia.title: Vanicracia
vanicracia.description: E-commerce focused on astrology, featuring various sections including services, courses, and products. It allows users to explore and purchase items, view their details, and access pre-recorded courses. It also includes a shopping cart with integrated payment systems and a user authentication system that supports login, registration, and password recovery.
vanicracia.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, React Toastify, Motion, Redux Toolkit, TanStack Query

alfombrasTauro.title: Alfombras Tauro
alfombrasTauro.description: A website specialized in rugs, offering a wide range of products, accessories, and services. It allows users to explore each category, access their respective items, and view detailed information about each one.
alfombrasTauro.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, Motion, TanStack Query

dondeSalgo.title: Dónde Salgo
dondeSalgo.description: Mobile application focused on the search for bars and other venues around Buenos Aires. It features multiple sections and an intuitive user flow. It also includes a complete authentication system, among many other things.
dondeSalgo.technologies: React Native, Expo, TypeScript, React Hook Form, TanStack Query, Redux Toolkit, React Native Reanimated, i18next

medicalSpace.title: Medical Space
medicalSpace.description: Web application designed to optimize medical management. It allows you to manage appointments, medical records, and patient data in a secure and efficient way. Its intuitive interface streamlines the work of medical and administrative staff, centralizing all information in one place.
medicalSpace.technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, React Toastify, Motion, Redux Toolkit, TanStack Query
